direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate UUIDs with similar internal structures and use random bytes for generation.
Both methods generate UUIDs but with different versions (v4 vs v7). The test cases for one can be adapted for the other.
Both methods generate UUIDs, but uuid() generates a v4 UUID, which can be substituted with uuidv7() for testing purposes.
Both methods generate unique identifiers (UUID vs MAC address) and involve random number generation.
Both methods generate unique identifiers (UUID vs IP address) and involve random number generation.
Both methods generate unique identifiers (UUID vs IP address) and involve random number generation.
